member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Exceptions.InvalidPoolObjectException
member.summary: Thrown when a method, constructor, operation or property that requires a valid receives invalid , or the object itself containing the property have it's handle invalidated.

remarks.para: s have an unique identifier in the pool (a special used by RAGE Engine), consists of an index and a counter. When a handle no longer represents a valid object inside the pool, it will be considered invalid, which will return .
Note that this exception will not be thrown if the object was ; Instead, or will be thrown.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with the specified object.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Logging.LogManager
member.summary: Provides utilties to manipulate and manage s.
member.remarks:
Patterns are made of pattern placeholders. Below is a list of all placeholders available:
{time} - current time in current culture
{timeutc} - current time in UTC
{newline} -
{message} - the actual message
{name} - the name of the logger
{level} - the log level
{owner} - the owner of the logger
{master} - the masterowner of the logger

member.param: The name of the file to log.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the file to log.

member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern of this instance.

member.summary: Creates a new owned by the master script.

member.summary: Creates a new owned by the specified script.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeature
member.summary: Provides utilties to manipulate a specific face feature of freemode model head blends.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeature.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the feature that is manipulate by this instance.

member.name: M:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeature.SetValue(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the value of this instance.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType
member.summary: An enumeration of all possible face feature types.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseWidth
member.summary: The width of the nose. Set to -1.0 for narrow, 1.0 for wide.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseHeight
member.summary: The height of the nose. Set to -1.0 for top, 1.0 for bottom.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseLength
member.summary: The length of the nose. Set to -1.0 for grand, 1.0 for petite.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseBridge
member.summary: The nose bridge. Set to -1.0 for round, 1.0 for hollow.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseTip
member.summary: The tip of the nose. Set to -1.0 for upward, 1.0 for downward.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NoseBridgeShift
member.summary: The shift of the nose bridge. Set to -1.0 to shift left, 1.0 to shift right.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.BrowHeight
member.summary: The height of the brow. Set to -1.0 for top, 1.0 for bottom.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.BrowWidth
member.summary: The width of the brow. Set to -1.0 for inward, 1.0 for outward.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.CheekboneHeight
member.summary: The height of the cheekbone. Set to -1.0 for top, 1.0 for bottom.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.CheekboneWidth
member.summary: The width of the cheekbone. Set to -1.0 for narrow, 1.0 for wide.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.CheeksWidth
member.summary: The width of the cheeks. Set to -1.0 for wide, 1.0 for narrow.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.Eyes
member.summary: The size of the eyes. Set to -1.0 for fully opened eyes, 1.0 for nearly closed eyes.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.Lips
member.summary: The thicknes of the lips. Set to -1.0 for wide, 1.0 for narrow.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.JawWidth
member.summary: The width of the jaw. Set to -1.0 for narrow, 1.0 for wide.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.JawHeight
member.summary: The height of the cheekbone. Set to -1.0 for top, 1.0 for bottom.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.ChinLength
member.summary: The length of the chin. Set to -1.0 for small chin, 1.0 for long chin.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.ChinPosition
member.summary: The position of the chin. Set to -1.0 for inward, 1.0 for outward.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.ChinWidth
member.summary: The width of the chin. Set to -1.0 for narrow, 1.0 for grand.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.ChinShape
member.summary: The shape of the jaw. Set to -1.0 for simple chin, 1.0 for double chin.

member.name: F:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.FaceFeatureType.NeckWidth
member.summary: The width of the neck. Set to -1.0 for narrow, 1.0 for wide.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend
member.summary: Provides methods and functions to manipulate ped head blend.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.ShapeMother
member.summary: Gets or sets the mother to manipulate shape of this instance.
member.remarks: Parents (mother and fathers) shares the same registry, so it's possible to set Mother and Father to the same value.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.ShapeFather
member.summary: Gets or sets the father to manipulate shape of this instance.
member.remarks: Parents (mother and fathers) shares the same registry, so it's possible to set Mother and Father to the same value.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.SkinMother
member.summary: Gets or sets the mother to manipulate skin of this instance.
member.remarks: Parents (mother and fathers) shares the same registry, so it's possible to set Mother and Father to the same value.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.SkinFather
member.summary: Gets or sets the father to manipulate skin of this instance.
member.remarks: Parents (mother and fathers) shares the same registry, so it's possible to set Mother and Father to the same value.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.ShapeMix
member.summary: Gets or sets the genetic bias between and on the head base shape.
member.value: The genetic bias between and . Must between 1.0 and -1.0 (otherwise an exception will be thrown). If set to 1.0, the head base shape of the ped will follow ; if set to -1.0, it will follow instead.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.SkinMix
member.summary: Gets or sets the genetic bias between and on the skin color (tone).
member.value: The genetic bias between and . Must between 1.0 and -1.0 (otherwise an exception will be thrown). If set to 1.0, the skin color (tone) of the ped will follow ; if set to -1.0, it will follow instead.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified value out of range of 1.0f and -1.0f.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.ShapeExtraFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the extra factor of the shape.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.SkinExtraFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the extra factor of the skin.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.MixExtraFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the extra factor when mixing skin and shapes.

member.name: M:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlend.Apply
member.summary: Applies the configuration of this instance to the ped.
member.remarks: It is impossible to set values directly as we cannot read these. Thus, you'll need to set the values first, then apply it using this method.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Entities.PedModel.Appearance.HeadBlendCustomizer
member.summary: Provides head blend customization to model and .

member.summary: Gets an instance of based on the specified .
member.param: The type of the head overlay.
member.remarks: Instances of are created by object constructor and stored first. Thus, two calls with the same will return the same instance.

member.summary: Gets an instance of based on the specified .
member.remarks: Instances of are created by object constructor and stored first. Thus, two calls with the same will return the same instance.
member.param: The type of the face feature.
member.returns: An instance of which can be used to change the value of a specified face feature.

member.summary: Receives an instance of which can be used to edit the face features, head blend datas, etc. of this instance.
member.returns: An instance of . Multiple calls with the same ped are not guaranteed to return the same instance.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Util.NativeFunctions
member.summary: Provides quick access for most natives being used in this library as well as other intresting natives.

member.name: M:WithLithum.Core.Util.NativeFunctions.GetNumberOfPlayers
member.summary:
Gets the number of players in the current session.
This is the wrapper for native function 0x407C7F91DDB46C16.
member.returns: If in multiplayer, the number of players in the current session; otherwise, always 1.

member.name: M:WithLithum.Core.Util.NativeFunctions.SetEntityLights(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
this enables or disables lights on things such as objects.
This is the wrapper for native function 0x7CFBA6A80BDF3874.
member.param: when toggle is set to true it turns off the lights, when false it turns them on.

member.name: T:WithLithum.Core.Util.Quicks
member.summary: Provide quick accesses. This class is meant to be imported using using static.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Util.Quicks.PChara
member.summary: Gets the player character.

member.name: P:WithLithum.Core.Util.Quicks.PVehicle
member.summary: Gets the player's current vehicle.
member.value: If player's in vehicle, player's current vehicle; otherwise, null.
